text: sorry for the long delayed followup. The new issues in gitlab are as follows:
Scroll bar appearing in SMS/Voicemail/Email/Calendar reminder
Wrong icon (navigation icon) appears in SMS/Email/Voicemail/Calendar reminder
"Tap to replay" text illegible in SMS/Voicemail/Email/Calendar reminder
Navigation -- swiping back from Navigation skips Alarm
Fitness Band -- Timer counting up not down
Index -- Fill -- Not calling correct effect
Index -- Remove change from play to stop icon
After returning to splash screen, no way to get back in
... so, I will start addressing these in order, as much as I can
Thanks Marissa. Let's also include the clock swipe fix in the to do list, too. How you feeling about all this? Balanced with making sure you still have a happy New Year time?
I'll do my best. Tonight's a bit busy, but I think I have most of tomorrow.

Today's progress: tap to replay text is lighter and bolder, and I started work on the animations that will show/hide the black message window when you swipe left/right instead of changing the page. Still more to do to get the clock demos to change, enable swipe navigation to other demos and for all the animations to replay at the correct times.
